casename: Vellasamy Lakshimi v Muthusamy Suppiah David
counsel: V. Ramakrishnan (V. Ramakrishnan & Co) for the plaintiffs; R. Narayanan and Zaminder Gill (Hilborne & Co) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Equity/Fraud/Undue influence/Whether the plaintiff had discharged her burden of proof in alleging fraud/Whether the plaintiff had adduced sufficient evidence to prove that the defendant had exerted undue influence on her.
Evidence/Onus of proof/Whether the burden of proof to prove undue influence lies on the defendant.
